CategoryID.description: Specifies the identifier of the folder containing the email.

CharacterSet.description: Indicates encoding used in an email message.

ClonedFromID.description: ID of email message from which the specified email message was created.

ContentAreaIDs.description: Contains information on content areas included in an email message.

ContentCheckStatus.description: Indicates whether content validation has completed for this email message.

HasDynamicSubjectLine.description: Indicates whether email message contains a dynamic subject line.

HTMLBody.description: Contains HTML body of an email message.

IsActive.description: Specifies whether the object is active.

IsHTMLPaste.description: Indicates whether email message was created via pasted HTML.

Name.description: Name of the object or property.

PreHeader.description: Contains text used in preheader of email message on mobile devices.

Status.description: Defines status of object. Status of an address.

Subject.description: Contains subject area information for a message.

SyncTextWithHTML.description: Makes the text version of an email contain the same content as the HTML version.

TextBody.description: Contains raw text body of a message.
